text: 6|111|Va agar mo faristagonro ʙa suji onon mefiristodem va [hatto] agar murdagon ʙo onon ʙa suxan meomadand va har cizero dasta-dasta dar ʙaroʙarason gird meovardem, [to rostguii pajomʙarro guvohi dihand], ʙoz ham imon nameovardand, magar in ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad, vale ʙestarason nodoni mekunand
